CC15_ALL_CORRECT: [OK] Row 15 is correct: all four name letters match.
CC15_NONE_CORRECT: [X] Row 15: no correct name letters found.
CC16_ALL_CORRECT: [OK] Row 16 is correct: all four countries are valid and match required initials.
CC16_NONE_CORRECT: [X] Row 16: no valid countries matched the required initials.
CC16_COUNTRY_BLANK: [x] {cell}: blank - please select a country from the list.
CC16_COUNTRY_NOT_APPROVED: [x] {cell}: '{found}' is not on the approved country list.
CC16_COUNTRY_WRONG_INITIAL: [x] {cell}: '{country}' does not start with required letter '{expected_letter}'.
CC17_ALL_VALID: [OK] Row 17: all lookup dates are valid and within {max_days} days.
CC17_PARTIAL: [!] Row 17: {earned}/{possible} dates are valid and within {max_days} days.
CC17_NONE_VALID: [X] Row 17: no valid lookup dates entered.
CC17_DATE_TOO_OLD: [x] {cell}: {date} is not within {max_days} days (it is {age_days} days away).
CC17_DATE_PARSE_ERROR: [x] {cell}: could not parse date. Enter as MM/DD/YYYY.
CC18_ALL_CORRECT: [OK] Row 18: all currency codes match the selected countries.
CC18_NONE_CORRECT: [X] Row 18: no correct currency codes found.
CC18_COUNTRY_UNKNOWN: [x] {cell}: cannot verify '{found}' because the country in Row 16 was invalid.
CC18_COUNTRY_UNKNOWN_BLANK: [x] {cell}: no code entered and country in Row 16 was invalid.
CC19_API_FETCH_FAILED: [X] Could not fetch live exchange rates: {error}.
CC19_CODE_INVALID: [x] {code_cell}: '{code}' is not a supported currency code.
CC19_RATE_WITHIN_TOLERANCE: [ok] {rate_cell}: rate is within {tolerance} of live value.
CC19_RATE_OUTSIDE_TOLERANCE: [x] {rate_cell}: rate is outside {tolerance} of live value.
CC20_FORMULA_MISSING: [x] {cell}: must contain a formula multiplying B4 and {rate_ref}.
